mapper.select: SELECT *, pc.parent_id cateParentId, l.id ladder_id,l.product_id ladder_product_id,l.discount ladder_discount,l.count ladder_count,l.price ladder_price, pf.id full_id,pf.product_id full_product_id,pf.full_price full_full_price,pf.reduce_price full_reduce_price, m.id member_id,m.product_id member_product_id,m.member_level_id member_member_level_id,m.member_price member_member_price,m.member_level_name member_member_level_name, s.id sku_id,s.product_id sku_product_id,s.price sku_price,s.low_stock sku_low_stock,s.pic sku_pic,s.sale sku_sale,s.sku_code sku_sku_code,s.sp1 sku_sp1,s.sp2 sku_sp2,s.sp3 sku_sp3,s.stock sku_stock, a.id attribute_id,a.product_id attribute_product_id,a.product_attribute_id attribute_product_attribute_id,a.value attribute_value FROM pms_product p LEFT JOIN pms_product_category pc on pc.id = p.product_category_id LEFT JOIN pms_product_ladder l ON p.id = l.product_id LEFT JOIN pms_product_full_reduction pf ON pf.product_id=p.id LEFT JOIN pms_member_price m ON m.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN pms_sku_stock s ON s.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN pms_product_attribute_value a ON a.product_id=p.id WHERE p.id=#{id};

SELECT sku.*, pro.id pro_id, pro.brand_id pro_brand_id, pro.product_category_id pro_product_category_id, pro.feight_template_id pro_feight_template_id, pro.product_attribute_category_id pro_product_attribute_category_id, pro.name pro_name, pro.pic pro_pic, pro.publish_status pro_publish_status, pro.new_status pro_new_status, pro.sale pro_sale, pro.gift_growth pro_gift_growth, pro.gift_point pro_gift_point, pro.use_point_limit pro_se_point_limit, pro.sub_title pro_sub_title, pro.description pro_description, pro.unit pro_unit, pro.weight pro_weight, pro.preview_status pro_preview_status, pro.service_ids pro_service_ids, pro.album_pics pro_album_pics, pro.detail_title pro_detail_title, pro.detail_desc pro_detail_desc, pro.detail_html pro_detail_html, pro.detail_mobile_html pro_detail_mobile_html, pro.promotion_start_time pro_promotion_start_time, pro.promotion_end_time pro_promotion_end_time, pro.promotion_per_limit pro_promotion_per_limit, pro.promotion_type pro_romotion_type, pro.brand_name pro_brand_name, pro.product_category_name pro_product_category_name, pro.price pro_price FROM `pms_sku_stock` sku LEFT JOIN `pms_product` pro ON pro.id= sku.`product_id` WHERE pro.id=#{productid} and sku.id = #{skuid};
